¬øQuieres compartir tu posici√≥n o escri: Do you want to share your location or write the name of the area to be monitored (for example, a town, an address, etc.)? Select one of the options. You need to turn Location onüìç in your mobile if your want to share with us your location

üëå Tomamos nota, ¬°gracias por colabor: üëå We take note of this, thanks for collaborate!
¬øSab√≠as que los fuegos producen tanto: Did you know that wildfires produce as much CO¬≤ as cars and about ‚Öï of all our carbon emissions?
Puedes ayudarnos (y al medioambiente) da: You can help us (and the environment) by spreading @TodosContraElFuego_bot among your contacts and groups so that more people can use it.
Tambi√©n puedes apoyarnos con alguna don: You can also support us with a donation. So we can pay our servers, third-party services, develop it for other platforms different than Telegram and to pay some coffee to the developers:
No compartimos ninguna informaci√≥n con: We do not share any information with third parties. The only goal of the data collected by this application is to help in the prevention and extinction of forest wildfires.
Adem√°s de las alertas proporcionadas po: In addition to the alerts provided by our users, we use active fire data provided by NASA (MODIS and VIIRS program). See map: http://effis.jrc.ec.europa.eu/static/effis_current_situation/public/index.html
Si quieres que a√±adamos otras fuentes d: If you want us to add other data sources about fires, please contact us at: info@comunes.org
‚ûñ ¬øMe puedo suscribir a varias zonas?: Can I subscribe to several zones?: Not now directly. There's a trick, add @TodosContraElFuego_bot as a member of a group that is suscribed to another zone.
‚ûñ ¬øHay \"falsos positivos\"?: S√≠ los: Are there "false positives"? Yes, sure. For example, you can get some fire alerts of refineries or incinerators. You can push on the location of the false positive and write a message like "false positive" or "it's a industry" so those fires are not notified.
Nos puedes ayudar mucho proporcion√°ndon: You can help us sending feedbacks about the veracity of the fire notifications, fire states and more. Only respond to the location of a fire notification (push over it and select "Respond") with any comment about that fire.
‚ûñ ¬øPuedo recibir notificaciones en un: Can I get alerts in a diferent or greater distance? Yes, if you are susbcribed, type for example "to 17 km" if you want receive alerts in a 17 km radius (you can type the distance you want).
‚ûñ ¬øNo voy a recibir demasiadas notifi: Will I receive too much alerts? We hope not, so we group the notifications of several sources and only send an alert by fire. For example, we don't repeat an alert if other user has notified the same fire in the zone previously.
‚ûñ Por ahora solo procesamos datos de f: By now we only manage NASA data of fires in Europe, but if you ask us a bigger action area we can do it.
‚ûñ Puedes a√±adir a @TodosContraElFuego: You can add @TodosContraElFuego_bot in a group as a member and receive notifications of a specified area in that group.
‚ûñ Puedes votar con alegr√≠a ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ: You can vote with happyness ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è our bot in https://telegram.me/storebot?start=TodosContraElFuego_bot.
